author: Niha Masih
title: Aggressive testing, contact tracing, cooked meals: How the Indian state of Kerala flattened its coronavirus curve
description: Can the Communist-run state be a model for India's response?
content: Sheeba K.M. was just one of more than 30,000 health workers in the Indian state of Kerala, part of the Communist state governments robust response to the coronavirus pandemic. Other efforts include aggressive testing, intense contact tracing, instituting a lo… [+6624 chars]
